tool.name: Tool9

param.name: input_folder
param.displayname: Folder containing all R log regression outputs. (parent folder for Intersect_M1M2, Union_M1, Union_M2, and Union_M1M2 folders that contain R result csvs.)
param.dialogReference: This folder should contain subfolders such as Intersect_M1M2, Union_M1, Union_M2, Union_M1M2. Inside each of these subfolders, there should be CSV files for the different variations (Accum, Median, Max, Min).

param.name: output_folder
param.displayname: Overall Output folder for Combined CSVs (subfolders will be created by the tool.)
param.dialogReference: This is the parent output folder where the combined CSV files will be saved. Subfolders will be created based on the parent subfolders (e.g., Intersect_M1M2, Union_M1, etc.), and within those, combined CSVs for each variation will be generated

tool.summary: This tool takes a folder of logistic regression outputs from window analysis (across multiple variations) and combines them into a single CSV file for each variation. The combined file is formatted for result visualizations and saved in the specified output folder.
